Reviews.Title: “Clean, friendly, affordable, great pool and breakfast”

Reviews.Title: “Comfy Beds - No Flat Screen”
Reviews.Author: tlc911
Reviews.Content: easy check fairly safe parking greenville 635 coming trying hotel staff explaining called park central miles service check breakfast swimming pool indoor fitness center appear clean neat typical bit chair ottoman double adjoining dont lock yourself adjoining door close safety latch closed door challenging courteously late night staff breakfast consists boiled eggs waffles breads muffins toaster microwave supplied apples fresh fruit containers yogurt fruit cups fresh boxed milks fridge pot oatmeal raisins coconut peanut butter toppings fresh hot coffee supplied nice flat screen tv wall indoor pool sauna bad swimming breakfast fitness free weights treadmills stationary bikes overall bad upgrades tv ppv

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful staff”
Reviews.Author: PrincessEthel
Reviews.Content: travel dallas frequently stayed fairfield twice pleasantly surprised hotel nice clean front desk staff curteous friendly helpful breakfast options pretty standard breakfast experience outstanding lady friendly helpful smiling person welcomes offers assist brings extra napkins tables offers refill drinks wishing day leave keeping breakfast items stocked counters clean pleasant surprise stay hotel recommend highly
